forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 24. West wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 33. West wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the night, Boston rests beneath a velvet canvas, dotted with the shimmering promises of its skyline. With temperatures dipping toward a bracing twenty-four degrees, the air carries a crispness that invigorates the senses while the west wind whispers gently through the urban sprawl. As dawn approaches, one can anticipate a transformation; the city will awaken to partly sunny skies, allowing a muted warmth to seep in during the hours ahead.

As the sun arouses the chilly landscape, expect a high near thirty-three degrees, with a brisk breeze occasionally gusting up to twenty-five miles per hour. This interplay of sun and wind presents a delightful challenge for your attire. Layer smartly—a cozy sweater beneath a light, wind-resistant jacket will serve you well, accompanied by a scarf to shield against those lively gusts. Embrace the weather with a stroll along the Charles River, where the rhythmic sound of water joining the chorus of urban life will accompany you. Alternatively, a visit to a local café may yield a warm nook, ideal for indulging in a comforting cup of coffee or tea, watching the spirited city come to life.
